Name: Elementium
About the game: Elementium is a puzzle mind game. Manage the world of illusions and solve puzzles based on illusions and physics. Unique game mechanics for manipulation are available to you, starting with ordinary objects and ending with physical laws. Whether it's an ordinary cube or a planet, now everything is in your hands! Features: More then 40 levels Sandbox mode Management of time, gravity, fire, planets and much more! Unique puzzles Excellent graphic
